title.narrative: Oxfam IBIS - Christmas Calendar 2017 - The children are Burkina Faso's gold

description.narrative:
By December 2020 children in the mining areas of Yagha Province return to and remain in school, making use of their right to quality primary education - as a result of improved teaching methods and curriculum, an active influencing and monitoring role of civil society and local and national advocacy campaigns against child labour in mines and for increased education financing / budgets
Specific Program Objectives
Specific Objective 1: The quality of education in 25 primary schools in the provinces of Yagha (Sahel) improved (methods, curriculum, gender equality)
Specific objective 2: Citizens use their increased awareness of the importance of education and the harmful impact of child labour to positively influence school attendance of girls and boys in the project area.
Specific objective 3: Local and national advocacy campaigns based on the project outcomes/ results influence structural and policy changes concerning child labour and the right to quality education in Burkina Faso
"Oxfam IBIS Christmas Calendar 2017 - Children are Burkina Faso's gold"
